plants.name: Aningapara
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows quickly and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without waterlogging. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Although it blooms in spring, it is beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones at the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water 1 time a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: It adapts to both sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On warmer days spray water on the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Imbé
plants.about: Medium-sized that adapts to different regions, in addition to being very easy to cultivate. It conquers more and more people.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Sansevieria
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps with sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the surrounding soil. Water 1 time a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: Yuccas are easy to maintain and take care of. You can place them in small pots or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Due to the water reserve of these greens, it is always better to water them less. Water once a week.

plants.name: Frutíferas
plants.about: These plants require a few hours of sun per day, so keep them close to windows.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchids
plants.about: Orchids bring a sense of tranquility and peace to the environment. They require little maintenance and are great for those with limited space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Water 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: With delicate flowers, violets are great for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: Do not wet the flowers and leaves. Water the soil twice a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: Hydrangeas are a rustic plant and adapt to different types of soil.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water once a day.
